subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4422 is on the way
description_text:
hello,

I just got my new pedals, I don't quite understand that when I calibrate
the brake I can only push 20kg, even though I think I can easily push 150kg
and that's why I can't set the brake settings to my liking, could you give
me some advice on what to do with the brake, and so I think I'm pushing
with quite a lot of force and still only 20kg

-Jan
